meta_description.text: Ultima Online (UO) is a fantasy massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) released on September 24, 1997 by Origin Systems. people_also_ask.heading: Not only is there an active communicty, but the game itself is still officially supported as a pay-to-play thing! I played from around 1998-2004 on the Napa and Chesapeake shards and haven't thought about UO in quite a few years!26-Jul-2017
